name: Safari Horse Hardcore Jumping
description:
Are you ready to play horse jumping game? The people who wish to get expertise in jumping and running horse will love to play this amazing simulator. Target of crossing hurdles and get coins and gems. Each level of the game more and more adventure. Be mindful that your race track is full with much kind of hindrances/hurdles and you have to jump. A some mistake your level failed. Being a professional rider, you will have to pass many hurdles and barriers of different sizes in this horse racing immersive jungle environment. So lets start this game.

Features:
-Multiple horse jumping levels to play
-Stunning 3D graphics
-Exciting obstacle challenges
-Smooth and clean control
-Best Graphics & real animal sounds
